headline: The Top 5 Analyst Questions From Mastercard’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Mastercard's fourth quarter results aligned with Wall Street’s revenue expectations while delivering a notable non-GAAP earnings outperformance. Management credited the company’s diversified global footprint and ongoing expansion of value-added services as the key drivers behind the quarter’s growth. CEO Michael Miebach highlighted new issuing deals across the U.S., Europe, and emerging markets, citing strengthened partnerships, especially with Capital One and Scotiabank. He also pointed to stro
